letters.description: Establish therapeutic rapport and identify the specific root cause or behavioral objective for the session.
Utilize progressive relaxation and breathing techniques to guide the client into a receptive state of focused attention.
Bypass the critical faculty of the conscious mind to communicate directly with the client's internal belief systems.
Deliver targeted therapeutic suggestions and metaphors to reframe limiting beliefs and install new cognitive patterns.
Reinforce the desired transformation through post-hypnotic suggestions and the creation of physical or mental triggers.
Gently guide the client back to full wakeful awareness while solidifying the session's insights into daily life.
